title: Plate, 1870–90
markings: On underside, near rim, written in red: "6" over "2605"
dimensions: H x diam.: 2.5 x 24 cm (1 x 9 7/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Charles E. Sampson Memorial Fund
description: Circular plate, the scalloped rim having tan ground with applied interlaced curving blue bands and gilt floral border; the well with a stylized gilt floral decoration in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, 1870–90.
1870–90. Glazed porcelain, gilding. Museum purchase from Charles E. Sampson Memorial Fund. 2003-5-3.
